sents: our project began in a far-off , inaccessible but very beautiful locale .
i gathered with other volunteers to use nearby loose rocks to rebuild and fortify existing roads and structures .
rocks were brought in by backhoe and truck for our use .
that 's me in the middle as we began our work with the rocks .
there will be an inscription on that rock describing our mission and from there , the entire valley can be seen .

sents: i was really looking forward to the day trip to the mountains . the bus dropped us off at the depot , and we had all day to explore .
i was by myself , so i decided to hike up to the mountain .
i crossed the fields , and i realized the mountains were not going to be as easy as i had thought .
i decided to hike in another direction , and that is how i found this small creek .
i followed it to this beach , and i spent the rest of my day there . it was sad to have to go back to the depot when the day was over .

sents: on our vacation we traveled through several small towns , each one of them unique .
outside of the towns we often saw rolling meadows lined with flowers .
the meadows , in turn , were lined with rocky mountain cliffs , such as this one .
laying between the mountains and the meadows were some beautiful rivers .
finally after passing over one last mountain , we arrived at the beach . our vacation destination was achieved .

on our way to our parents house , we found a building with a streaming fountain .
after passing through the city , we stumbled upon a house made out of adobe .

once we found our way back , we decided to pass through a field of beautiful flowers .

sents: oh boy , what was in that cocktail , everything has this really red , blood-like hue ? i knew i should n't have accepted a drink from this guy .
eww , now what 's he doing ? put your tongue away sir , you are certainly not my type . wait , are those fangs ?
i 'm feeling kind of dizzy and these guys are looking like food . oh geez , what did i drink ?
now this guy 's drinking it too . it looks like ... like blood ! what have i got myself in to here ?
oh well , if you ca n't beat them , join them . here 's to eternity guys . cheers !

sents: on graduation night , we all headed down to the red room for some drinks and good times .
after imbibing an incredible amount of alcohol , we decided that we would solve all the world 's problems .
famine , disease and war were the topics of discussion .
the more we drank , the better we became at figuring out the right course of action .
by the end of the night , we concluded that we would offer our solutions to the organization organization in the coming days . we drank some more to celebrate our achievements .

[male] and his wife had their photo taken with the restaurant hostess , a lovely lady who had worked there for seven years .
[male] did n't drink too much that evening , but his friend drank so much that he did n't remember what happened later that night .
[male] 's friend woke up the next morning with a terrible hangover , and never remembered how he got that tattoo on his back .

visitors pack into small eating areas to warm up .
the performers however do n't seem to feel the cold as they go about their nights performing their practiced routines .

some of the people in attendance are difficult to place as actors in period clothing , guests wearing costumes , or victims of the carnival 's experimentation in time traveling . their good moods do n't leave you especially curious regardless .

we talked until dawn , and then i walked her home to her apartment . i ca n't wait to see her again !

sents: who names a ride 'the tickler ' ? it 's a terrifying thought .
but there i was , strapped into it all the same , ready to be ... tickled , whatever that means .

needless to say , i soon regretted my decision to go on the ride as it span me around in the air for a very long time . the only thing that felt like it was being tickled was the back of my throat was the bile rose and rose .
some unsuspecting children wearing yellow shirts were about to be the recipient of my horrible , chunky vomit .
thankfully , few noticed it arriving , as every child was moe involved in their own games rather than looking to the sky . i suppose it 's good they did n't .

sents: the town of location in location location is a sleepy little town that has a unique claim to fame .
it is the home of the world 's largest living lit christmas tree .
i stayed in this bed and breakfast when i visited the town to see the tree lit in early december .
the whole town gathered at this restaurant to have hot chocolate and cookies before the tree lighting ceremony .
after the tree was lit , those that wanted to could attend a christmas service in this small church .

then lastly , i made the dessert that i knew everyone liked that mom used to make .
then i had everyone sit at the table to get a picture and to serve them dinner . everyone loved it !
then i went into the kitchen and saw the mess that i forgot was there . it only took 35 minutes to clean up and it was so worth it !

sents: i love trains very much , i also love going to train shows each year and looking at different models .

here we have a rare train car . only 3 were made , i wish i could have one . main reason i come to these train shows .
the final train i looked at was this beauty ; the silver bullet , one of the fastest trains in the world .

sents: [female] and i decided to go to a local market for something to eat one night . the lights on the tree outside grabbed our attention and seemed to invite us in .
there were so many things to choose from , and the menus were pictures which was great for us since we still could n't speak the language .
we ended up having a delicious , hot bowl of soup .
then , [female] suggested ice cream for dessert since the soup was kind of spicy .
afterwards , we had to stop for gas . then we went home .

the menu options for meal were almost overwhelming .
i decided to order the chicken soup with rice noodles .
for dessert and ice cream cone was very refreshing .
we nearly forgot the gas after that delicious meal .

after takeoff , i felt better once i looked out my window and saw the beautiful view .
after landing , the sky was less attractive , a dreary gray having taken over .

once outside the plane , it looked even less attractive , but it was the country i was excited for , not the airport .

sents: we 're off to location for the day but first - breakfast . and what better way to start the day than with bacon and fried potatoes . my arteries might not love it but my belly is in heaven !
bacon 's ready and the family raids the kitchen . wow , look how much bacon my sister has grabbed . save some for the rest of us !

we catch the ferry and i hang out on the top deck to watch the waves with my brother . the motion of the ocean does n't seem to be agreeing with him . he looks quite green . i make sure i 'm not standing downwind ...
getting off of this thing is going to be a real pain . look at all these cars . but we 're in location at last .
a quick photo with the boys on deck before we leave . look out location , he we come !

sents: upon my travels along the beach i come across some strange finds , like this tower in the distance .

i ride my mighty steed towards the structure to maybe find something cool .
upon getting closer , i find this glorious house , which i 'll make my own place to live .

the lighthouses in the ocean are so charming that it kind of makes me want to live here .
the seagulls can be a problem though , so keep your eyes open .

of course , our hotel had a breathtaking view , as does everything else here .

sents: our trip to location included a side visit to an awesome little town .
there were many old buildings , and some staircases that led to nowhere .
we went into a church that had the most elaborate altar .
we had lunch in a really cool little pub in town .
after lunch we explored a church that was built over 200 years ago .

there were artists with paintings displayed and others that were creating art in front of the visitors .
this woman created balloon creatures and figures that were quite impressive .
many of the paintings were by new students trying to make a name for themselves . they served food and refreshments to those of us browsing to keep our interest .
i met many interesting people at the gallery and made a few new friends who shared my art interests .

sents: some people do n't see any beauty in an industrial city .
they say the street are bleak , and the cloud of pollution always hangs over everything .
the area under the overpass does n't hold any magic for them .
but they do n't see the gorgeous bridge at the edge of town , or the lovely arches at the start of the bridge .
when my family gets together in my gritty hometown , we all celebrate the hidden beauties the town contains .

sents: refinery is the main business in this town .
people may complain about the oil business -- about its hazards -- but this town and this people survive because of the oil business .
[male] and miles of flat open space . thank god there is wealth hidden beneath the earth .
we have learned to live in spite of polluted water . you get accustomed to the smell , and drink bottled water .
we have a quiet social life . nothing fancy . the oil business has too many fluctuations to build something fancy .

sents: to get the perfect flower picture this spring we went to the park .
the pinks , whites , and reds , were beautiful , but not quite what we wanted .
we spent time in the gazebo and looked around for inspiration .
we found a deity statue that was just about the perfect color .
finally we found the orange and yellow hues we wanted and took our perfect flower picture .

sents: an old clock tower had not worked in many years it merely stood as an attraction .
the locals would talk and try to bring together many to repair it .
although the local churches were very empty with two buildings supporting it they did what they could .
they even brought it to court to see that the actions being taken were legal .
once fixed the residents of the town spent the rest of the day riding boats to celebrate their success on fixing the clock .

sents: today we went to the carnival.the first attraction we saw , was the fun house .
the fun house had mirrors that made your body look very funny and look as if it where shaped oddly .
the second ride was the zipper . i was bright and made you do flips in a cage .
we went really high in the air and flipped a lot of times . the sun even set while we where in the air .
we said goodbye to the carnival on our final ride , the farris wheel . it lifted us high enough to slowly watch the whole carnival .

sents: i once had a dream , my dream was to grow from a small little firecracker , to a big firework like my daddy .
then it actually happened ! this magical day in early july i got all packed up and sent out to do work !
i started as a dim red light , slowly glowing brighter and brighter . my friend rainbow cracker even joined me in the festivities !
we grew and grew , we could hear people cheering in the distance , i had finally made it !

but then something weird happened , i started to fade out and fall to the ground , i feel this may be my final journal entry..fading more dim..i hope dad is pro ... . rip little red firecracker 7/4/15

i love being outside . i especially love when my sis pushes the swing for me !
after a long day we drove granny back to her own home , she was n't able to drive due to her bad knee ...

sents: the student was really happy about the road trip she was taking with a fellow classmate , and she enjoyed taking photos of the freeway they were traveling on .
when the classmates pulled up to a toll booth , they both fumbled in their wallets for dollar bills to pay the toll .
when the classmates came upon a bridge that they both remembered from childhood , one of them snapped a quick picture of he bridge for posterity .
neither of the students had seen snow before , and were really happy to find it snowing during their trip .
as soon as they came upon a rest stop , they stopped the car and got out to walk around and marvel at the snow .

sents: i 'm not a huge fan of team-building meetings so i was n't too thrilled to see the rooms blocked off and a speaker when i came into work this morning .
and then the speaker started with a power point about being inclusive and i was just waiting for words like `` synergy '' and `` think outside the box . ''
and , of course , we had to break into small groups to come up with ideas which is always awkward for me as i tend to be introverted .
but i did enjoy the smaller session later in the day and the use of the wall as a projector .
i ended up having a good day because how can you not like an exercise that has you visually represent a classic saying !

and , one house that was kind of institutional-looking . but , no sculptures in any yards .

the giraffes are fun to feed . their long tongues are blue and icky looking !

the penguins keep coming right up to the glass of their enclosure . it 's as if they want you to take them hom .
my granddaughter 's favorite part is feeding the lorikeets from her hand .

sents: my family and i live on a farm , so when i took my first plane ride to the big city , i was so excited .
the first thing we did after checking into our hotel was take a long boat ride on the river that winds around the downtown area .
that night we attended a baseball game , my first major league game . i ate 3 hotdogs .
the next day we visited city hall and learned a lot about the history of the great city .
for me the highlight was when my dad arranged for us to take a helicopter ride at night . so cool !

this is the bed and breakfast we stayed at on our trip .

sents: the cafe was crazy last night . so many people . i 'm glad i got a day off today .

mad [male] 's meat was a big hit . we 've still never managed to figure out what it is or where he gets it from but when it tastes this good , who cares if a couple of drifters go missing once in a while .
oh these animals really need to clean up after them . this is my life repeated night after night . ugh .
this guy is a wizard in the kitchen . no matter what you give him , he 'll manage to rustle up something edible . which is good , because sometimes pickings are a little slim around here .
mystery meat empanadas are on the menu tonight . the mystery is why anyone eats them but concha is a nice old lady so we let her stick around .

the trip was n't all about goofing off . they had fun relaxing at the beautiful beach .

the beaches were beautiful and there were tons of surfers out ready to ride the waves .
the food at the hotel was amazing . everything was so artfully arranged and tasted amazing .
i went sightseeing on horseback and got lots of great pictures .
on my last night , i sat and watched the sunset with a cocktail . it was so relaxing and enjoyable .

sents: yarn comes in many different colours that help people be very creative with their creations .
my grandmother knits frequently and for the longest time she was the only person i knew who did this in my family .
when i went to college , i met a nice girl who knitted to relieve stress and make a little extra money on the side by making things for people .
i thought that was really cool and tried to learn to knit myself but i am super uncoordinated and didnt have the patience to keep it up .
i am always intrigued when i see yarn balls because there is mystery locked within them to what will com from them from talented people .

sents: [male] knew his days were limited ; the drive to `` the middle of nowhere '' would not buy more time .
he made it to location , and stopped , the cancer stripping his energy reserves .
the town had a chic , artsy feel , that annoyed his self pity .
but the lake and mountains in the distance provided just the solemn peace he needed .
the next day , he hopped back on the open road , determined to die at home .

sents: we had all seen the pictures dad left behind . we had n't had the time to walk into location before , but my work trip gave us an opportunity .
i remember dad talking about location in the loftiest of ways . he certainly took a lot of pictures .
we saw a lot of graffiti when we came in , and we were sure to take a good inventory of it .
dad had liked street art , but what he liked most of all was the water . we spent a lot of time taking pictures for posterity .
location , after the street art and the water , really was a small town , unfortunately . i could n't see what he saw in it . i knew he 'd love the pictures though .

sents: we drove up the driveway towards the english manor , our new summer home .

but the whole time , we had no clue that there were two peacocks on the roof , eavesdropping on every word .

but always ready and willing for a selfie . maybe , they might think i 'm a tourist .
finally , i compared the statues . damn ! they do n't match . my search continues .

sents: natural world museums give us the chance to see life that we would n't normally get to see .
this museum shows us what different creatures bones structures were like .
some animals were massive . it 's hard to imagine how big this creature was when it was alive .
some creatures still exist , yet sometimes we forget how big they are .
museums are very educational and fun to visit .

sents: one of my favorite eateries from vacation this year was boudin . this bakery is found in many locations in the location .

the breads are made from sourdough , hearth breads , and other specialties and the prices are reasonable .
we even had the opportunity to watch the bakers in action .
if you visit a town with a organization organization organization organization , be sure to stop in !

sents: this guy decided that he wanted highlights in his hair , so he asked his girlfriend for help .
she laughed because she knew he was not going to enjoy the process , but she agreed to do it anyway .
since they had no cape , she cut a hole in a trash bag and placed it over his head .
he was skeptical when she first washed out his hair . he was not at all sure that he was going to like it .
turns out , he was right . he did n't like it , but he knew that it would grow out so he was n't too upset .

sents: i go to estate and garage sales and buy boxes of photos , among other antiques .
i 'm not sure what to say about this but collecting them makes me feel like each one has a story to tell .
those faces so fresh and bright , memories of things and places that those photos hold always mystifies me when i look at them .
so many memories held in amber . these photos mark a time in a moment that can not be recreated .
it is amazing to me to find these photos and making my own stories and memories of these strangers . i love these old treasures .

instead , we enjoyed a cup of coffee at the bulldog and talked about the fun we had on the amusement park rides .

sents: i had a beautiful day on the beach yesterday with [male] . when we first left the parking lot , we could see seals in the distance on the beach . [male] caught this pic with his zoom lens .
in order to get to the beach we had to go through a bit of woods . we saw these beautiful flowers growing wild .
and this little animal ... though i 'm not sure what it is . leaves on the ground so close to the beach ... it 's kind of amazing the variety of vegetation in this area .
when we got down on the sand ourselves , we saw people playing and scampering around on these huge boulders . really unique shapes . must 've been carved by the wind and water .
further down the beach , rocks formed an arch and were draped with the vegetation we had seen earlier in the woods . it was a cool place to get out of the sun .

we also visited a beautiful lush river and walkway in a nearby park .
the landscape was gorgeous . we ended our vacation rafting in the nearby lake .
